title: All relaxations outlined hereinabove shall be admissible to entire project area under the URS
clause_text: All relaxations outlined hereinabove shall be admissible to entire project area under the URS. Premium shall not be charged for all or any of the relaxations given hereinabove or for any other relaxations mentioned in Regulation No 31(1). The parking in the scheme shall be provided as per Regulation No.44.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-
